scripts.start: npm run build && node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node build/server/server.js
scripts.calendar:provision: npm run build && node --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node build/schema/provision.js CALENDAR_DATABASE_URL
scripts.portal:migrate:latest: npm run portal:provision && npx knex --esm --knexfile src/schema/portal/knexfile.cjs migrate:latest
scripts.portal:migrate:list: npm run portal:provision && npx knex --esm --knexfile src/schema/portal/knexfile.cjs migrate:list
scripts.portal:migrate:rollback: npm run portal:provision && npx knex --esm --knexfile src/schema/portal/knexfile.cjs migrate:rollback
scripts.calendar:migrate:latest: npm run calendar:provision && npx knex --esm --knexfile src/schema/calendar/knexfile.cjs migrate:latest
scripts.calendar:migrate:list: npm run calendar:provision && npx knex --esm --knexfile src/schema/calendar/knexfile.cjs migrate:list
scripts.calendar:migrate:rollback: npm run calendar:provision && npx knex --esm --knexfile src/schema/calendar/knexfile.cjs migrate:rollback
